Class Training

java.lang.Object
  Training

public class Training
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the method needed to create training data for the classification algorithm

Author:
giulio

 void Gainfiltering()
          GAIN FILTERING: filters the words in the hastable choosing the best one for classification following different steps: 1- Removes word with less than 2 appareance or with the same occurrencies in ham and spam 2- Deletes the words under the average gain

preProcessFiles

public void preProcessFiles(java.lang.String[] path)
PREPROCESSOR: read the files/folders and creates a training data. It uses various filters

Parameters:

addToWordTable

public void addToWordTable(int mode)
Create an hashtable of words reading the words from the temp file output

Parameters:
mode - 0 means "ham", 1 means "spam"

Gainfiltering

public void Gainfiltering()
GAIN FILTERING: filters the words in the hastable choosing the best one for classification following different steps: 1- Removes word with less than 2 appareance or with the same occurrencies in ham and spam 2- Deletes the words under the average gain

calcGain

public double calcGain(Word w)
Calculates Information Gain of a word

Parameters:
w - the word
Returns:
the information gain value

createConnectionTable

public void createConnectionTable(java.lang.String[] path)
Create a table of connections between words and filter them The complexity of this algorithm is huge,but I'm able to filter the amount of information a lot later. I wanted the algorithm to be "unsupervised" so it creates gives importance to links automatically based on the frequence

Parameters:
path -

filterConnections

public void filterConnections()
Filter the arcs. I had no time to optimize the Arcs Feature.
